name: random-crypto-string
description: Generates random strings using the 'crypto' module which also makes it async

scripts.preparecompiled: cat index.js | sed 's!//# sourceMappingURL!module.exports = exports.default\n//# sourceMappingURL!' > exported.js
scripts.prepublish: typings install && tsc && npm run-script preparecompiled
scripts.test: tsc && mocha --require source-map-support/register test && tsc && npm run-script preparecompiled && node require-test.js

author: Matthew Forrester <github.com@speechmarks.com>
